casebody.data:
CREWS
v.
CREWS 119A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 2, 2019 Carolyn J. Woodruff, Attorney at Law, Jessica Snowberger Bullock, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Crews, James Scott. Jon W. Myers, Attorney at Law, Lexington, Michelle Duff King, Attorney at Law, for Crews, Lisa Dawn.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of May 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of May 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 7th day of June 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
